imgui.flag

Class ImGuiColorEditFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.flag.ImGuiColorEditFlags

  • public final class ImGuiColorEditFlags
extends java.lang.Object
    Flags for ColorEdit3() / ColorEdit4() / ColorPicker3() / ColorPicker4() / ColorButton()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AlphaBar
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker: show vertical alpha bar/gradient in picker.
      static int AlphaPreview
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: display preview as a transparent color over a checkerboard, instead of opaque.
      static int AlphaPreviewHalf
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: display half opaque / half checkerboard, instead of opaque.
      static int DisplayHex
      [Display]
      static int DisplayHSV
      [Display]

      [Display]
      static int Float
      [DataType]
      static int HDR
      (WIP) ColorEdit: Currently only disable 0.0f..1.0f limits in RGBA edition (note: you probably want to use ImGuiColorEditFlags_Float flag as well).
      static int InputHSV
      [Input]
      static int InputRGB
      [Input]
      static int NoAlpha
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: ignore Alpha component (will only read 3 components from the input pointer).
      static int NoBorder
      ColorButton: disable border (which is enforced by default)
      static int NoDragDrop
      ColorEdit: disable drag and drop target.
      static int NoInputs
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker: disable inputs sliders/text widgets (e.g.
      static int NoLabel
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker: disable display of inline text label (the label is still forwarded to the tooltip and picker).
      static int None 
      static int NoOptions
      ColorEdit: disable toggling options menu when right-clicking on inputs/small preview.
      static int NoPicker
      ColorEdit: disable picker when clicking on colored square.
      static int NoSidePreview
      ColorPicker: disable bigger color preview on right side of the picker, use small colored square preview instead.
      static int NoSmallPreview
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker: disable colored square preview next to the inputs.
      static int NoTooltip
      ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: disable tooltip when hovering the preview.
      static int OptionsDefault
      Defaults Options.

      [DataType]

      • NoSmallPreview

        public static final int NoSmallPreview
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker: disable colored square preview next to the inputs. (e.g. to show only the inputs)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoInputs

        public static final int NoInputs
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker: disable inputs sliders/text widgets (e.g. to show only the small preview colored square).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoTooltip

        public static final int NoTooltip
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: disable tooltip when hovering the preview.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoLabel

        public static final int NoLabel
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker: disable display of inline text label (the label is still forwarded to the tooltip and picker).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoSidePreview

        public static final int NoSidePreview
        ColorPicker: disable bigger color preview on right side of the picker, use small colored square preview instead.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoDragDrop

        public static final int NoDragDrop
        ColorEdit: disable drag and drop target. ColorButton: disable drag and drop source.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoBorder

        public static final int NoBorder
        ColorButton: disable border (which is enforced by default)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AlphaBar

        public static final int AlphaBar
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker: show vertical alpha bar/gradient in picker.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AlphaPreview

        public static final int AlphaPreview
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: display preview as a transparent color over a checkerboard, instead of opaque.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AlphaPreviewHalf

        public static final int AlphaPreviewHalf
        ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: display half opaque / half checkerboard, instead of opaque.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HDR

        public static final int HDR
        (WIP) ColorEdit: Currently only disable 0.0f..1.0f limits in RGBA edition (note: you probably want to use ImGuiColorEditFlags_Float flag as well).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DisplayRGB

        public static final int DisplayRGB
        [Display]

        ColorEdit: override _display_ type among RGB/HSV/Hex. ColorPicker: select any combination using one or more of RGB/HSV/Hex.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Uint8

        public static final int Uint8
        [DataType]

        ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: _display_ values formatted as 0..255.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Float

        public static final int Float
        [DataType]

        ColorEdit, ColorPicker, ColorButton: _display_ values formatted as 0.0f..1.0f floats instead of 0..255 integers. No round-trip of value via integers.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PickerHueBar

        public static final int PickerHueBar
        [Picker]

        ColorPicker: bar for Hue, rectangle for Sat/Value.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PickerHueWheel

        public static final int PickerHueWheel
        [Picker]

        ColorPicker: wheel for Hue, triangle for Sat/Value.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • InputRGB

        public static final int InputRGB
        [Input]

        ColorEdit, ColorPicker: input and output data in RGB format.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • InputHSV

        public static final int InputHSV
        [Input]

        ColorEdit, ColorPicker: input and output data in HSV format.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OptionsDefault

        public static final int OptionsDefault
        Defaults Options. You can set application defaults using SetColorEditOptions(). The intent is that you probably don't want to override them in most of your calls. Let the user choose via the option menu and/or call SetColorEditOptions() once during startup.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
